definitions.text: a distinct part that can be specified separately in a group of things that could be enumerated on a list
examples: he noticed an item in the New York Times
she had several items on her shopping list
the main point on the agenda was taken up first

definitions.text: a small part that can be considered separately from the whole
examples: it was perfect in all details

definitions.text: a whole individual unit; especially when included in a list or collection
examples: they reduced the price on many items

definitions.text: an isolated fact that is considered separately from the whole
examples: several of the details are similar

definitions.text: an individual instance of a type of symbol
examples: the word`error' contains three tokens of `r'

definitions.text: (used when listing or enumerating items) also; -Philip Guedalla
examples: a length of chain, item a hook
